name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Content
1	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
2	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
          Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic theory
3	Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic theory
4	Chapter 13 Bonding: General Concepts
5	Chapter 13 Bonding General Concepts
6	Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding
7	Exam I (Chapter 11- 13)
8	Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding
9	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
10	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
11	Chapter 16 Liquids and Solids
12	Chapter 16 Liquids and Solids
13	Chapter 17 Properties of solution 
          Exam II (Chapter 14-16)
14	Chapter 17 Properties of solution
15	Chapter 18 The Representative Elements; Group 1A through 4A
16	Chapter 19 The Representative Elements; Group 5A through 8A
17	Chapter 20 Transition Metals and Coordination Chemistry
18	Exam III (Chapter 17-20)
scorePolicy: Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%); Attendance (10 %)
materials: Zumdahl, Steven S., Chemical Principles; Sixth Edition, Houghton Mifflin Company
